description: After having little luck landing a summer job to start saving up for college, the ever-entrepreneurial Breanna Simon, at 17 years old, employed herself as the Founder/Owner/Operator of Bee’s Ice Cream. Three extremely successful years later and now every adult & child alike is always delighted to see (or hear!) Bee’s Ice Cream truck make its way down their street because it means that it’s time to indulge in a tasty frozen treat. With their famously sweet service, vast selection of novelty favorites, and hoppin' music box, Bee’s Ice Cream is the perfect truck for every kind of occasion!
name: Bee's Ice Cream
